modName: MagExtender - Papyrus Utility for Magic Effects
summary: SKSE Plugin that allows further modifications of Magic Effects using papyrus. (Modder Resource)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#444444].[/color]


[color=DeepSkyBlue][size=3][b]MagExtender: MagicEffect Utility for Papyrus[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#444444].....................[/color] The most recent version of [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE[/url] (1.7.0) greatly expands the options available to mod authors when it
[color=#444444].....................[/color] comes to editing Magic Effects.

[color=#444444].....................[/color] This plugin will allow you to edit even more things that still remained inaccessible from papyrus. The
[color=#444444].....................[/color] list includes editing effect archetypes on-the-fly, changing actor values associated with effects, the
[color=#444444].....................[/color] keywords of PeakValueMods, & Form entries linked to several unique magic effects archetypes,
[color=#444444].....................[/color] just to name a few. So, for instance:

[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Make spells do dramatically different things for users depending on circumstances
[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Change the actor summoned with SummonCreature archetype
[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Change the bound weapon summoned with BoundWeapon archetype
[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Stop spell effects from stacking or enable stacking at certain times
[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Change the Race player morphs into when transforming via Werewolf or VampireLord
[color=#444444]................................[/color] Magic Effect archetypes (untested, but might work :p)
[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Make a spell spawn different hazards under different circumstances
[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Lots of other possibilities
[color=#444444].............................[/color] - Or condition any of these things on MCM options that the user can choose themselves


[color=#444444].....................[/color] I have been working on these functions as part of some larger mod projects of my own in which
[color=#444444].....................[/color] I'll need more extensive control over MGEFs, and I figured I might as well build a library of sorts and
[color=#444444].....................[/color] share it with the rest of you. Feel free to make requests for other functions you'd like added, or let
[color=#444444].....................[/color] me know if anything isn't working as advertised. If your requests are related to Magic/Spells/etc.
[color=#444444].....................[/color] and they seem plausible, I will try to add them to the list of functions included in the plugin.



[color=DeepSkyBlue][b]Included Functions[/b][/color][b]

[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFArchetype()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFPrimaryAV()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFSecondaryAV()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFSecondaryAVWeight()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFRelatedForm()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFTaperValues()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFTaperDuration()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFTaperWeight()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]SetMGEFTaperCurve()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFArchetype()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFArchetypeNum()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFPrimaryAV()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFSecondaryAV()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFSecondaryAVWeight()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFRelatedForm()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFTaperDuration()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFTaperWeight()[/color]
[color=#444444].....................[/color] [color=GhostWhite]GetMGEFTaperCurve()[/color][/b]



[color=DeepSkyBlue][b]Credits & Permissions[/b][/color]

[color=#444444].....................[/color] - Big thanks to the SKSE team
[color=#444444].....................[/color] - Special thanks to PurpleLunchBox for his extensive work on MagicEffects for the latest
[color=#444444].......................[/color] build of SKSE and for some help he gave me as I was working on this plugin.

[color=#444444].....................[/color] Feel free to package this plugin with your own mods and use it for your own projects. Please just
[color=#444444].....................[/color] mention me in a footnote somewhere.

[color=#444444].....................[/color] I've also included the source and a few brief notes about how to compile an SKSE plugin for anyone
[color=#444444].....................[/color] looking for information about that, because it was difficult to find examples as I was learning, and
[color=#444444].....................[/color] I would have appreciated having more available at the time.
author: egocarib
